verses.text: Manhxo jantacoc ix in tzalaj yed' eb' ix alan d'ayin icha tic: Conh d'a stemplo Jehová, xchi eb'.
Axo ticnaic ay onhxo ek' d'a yol chonhab' Jerusalén tic.
A Jerusalén, junnhej chonhab'il yaj sb'oi.
A d'a jun chonhab' tic sja junjun macanhil eb' schonhab' Jehová, yic vach' sb'itaj icha yutejnac yalancan d'a eb' co mam quicham.
A d'a jun chonhab' tic ay juntzanh despacho b'aj sch'olb'itaj eb' anima yuj yinhtilal vinhaj David d'a stojolal.
k'anec to syak' junk'olal Dios d'a Jerusalén. Junk'olalocab' yaj eb' xajanan jun chonhab' tic.
Ayocab' junk'olal d'a yol smuroal yed' d'a yol spat sreyal jun chonhab' tic, xe chi.
Yuj svach'iloc eb' in k'ab' voc yed' eb' vetchonhab', yuj chi' svala': Ayocab' junk'olal, xin chi.
Yujto xajan scajnub' Jehová co Diosal vuuj, yuj chi' ol vak' vip in sayanek' tas tz'och svach'iloc Jerusalén tic.
